Content:
How long have you been learning English 
I have been learning English for
Over ten years 
About two years
Less than a year

Why do you want to learn English
I want to 
Have a high paying job 
Study abroad
Make friends around the world

How do you feel when you talk to foreigners 
I feel talking to foreigners 
Shy
Confident
Amazing

What do you find diffficult when learning English
I finddifficult
english vocabulary
english pronunciation
english grammar

Do you have a problem with communicating in English
I have a problem with
communicating in English
expressing my ideas
understanding native speakers

How do you improve your English
I improve my English by
using English learning apps
watching movies without subtitles
talking to foreigners

Have you prepared for the exam
I have studiedfor the exam
a lot
a little
just enough

How many hours do you spend studying each day
I spendstudying each day
half an hour
about an hour
more than two hours

How do you usually prepare for exams
I usually
revise all the learning materials
learn by heart
join in study groups

What do you do to stay focused
Ito stay focused
turn off my phone
drink coffee
put on headphones

What kind of problems do you have when taking a test
Ieasily
forget what I learned
lose track of time
freak out

How did you do on the test
I didon the test
pretty well
amazing
awful

Do you have any plans for improving your skills
I have plans for improving
my presentation skills
my time-management skills
my problem-solving skills

Why do you want to take extra courses
I take extra courses to
gain knowledge
further my career
work more efficiently

Which courses do you want to take
I want to take
a business course
a programming course
an English course

What do you prefer online classes or offline classes
I prefer
online classes
hybrid classes
offline classes

Do you prefer studying alone or in groups
I prefer
studying alone
studying in groups of two
studying in groups of four

Would you like to join an online business class with me
I would like to join
an online business class
an online marketing class
an online English class

What is your major
My major is
business management
finance
information technology

Why did you choose your major
I want to
earn a lot of money
open my own business
be an engineer

What do you think about your major
I find my major
useful
interesting
boring

What is your plan after graduation
My plan is to
enter grad school
get a job
take a gap year

Would you study abroad if you had a chance
I would love to
study abroad
join an exchange program
study locally

What will be taught in the course
The course will cover topics such as
business strategies
market research
statistic

Who is the instructor for the course
The instructor for the course is
a businessman
a creative mentor
a friendly coach

When will the class take place 
The class will take place
in March
on the next Wednesday
after three months

Where is the location of the class
The location of the class is
at the center
at a building
at a university

How much is the tuition fee
The tuition fee for the course is
two million dong
four point five million dong
one thousand dollars

How can I pay the tuition fee
You can pay the tuition fee by
online payment
scholarship
cash
